meanings.definition: A performance or show, especially a movie, held in the daytime.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed watching matinees at the theater on sunny afternoons.
meanings.sent2: The cinema often offers matinees for families on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The matinees were so popular that the theater had to add extra daytime shows.
meanings.sent4: Attending matinees is like stepping into a bright, daytime world of entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The matinees were like colorful daytime dreams come to life on the big screen.

meanings.definition: The time or period of such a performance.
meanings.sent1: During the matinees, the theater is filled with families and friends.
meanings.sent2: Matinees are a great way to spend a sunny afternoon at the movies.
meanings.sent3: The matinees always seem to make the daytime fly by in a blur of excitement.
meanings.sent4: In the world of entertainment, matinees are like bright spots in the daytime schedule.
meanings.sent5: The matinees mark the cheerful hours when the theater comes alive with laughter and joy.
